name: They Matter
description:
They Matter is a short platform game that is related to the riot that is happening.

This game is a submission to the "Godot Wild jam #22", a 9 day jam dedicated to the Godot engine. This jam's theme was REVOLUTION.

This game was made under 24 hours and was submitted on 6/21/2020.

If you have any feedback or wan't to say something about the game, Feel free to comment down below as it would be greatly appreciated  :)

Notes:

-The MacOS version of the game will be released after the jam ends due to unforeseen circumstances, I hope this is not that big of a problem!!!!
